headline: Should Akamai Technologies' (AKAM) Expanded Apiiro Partnership Prompt Strategic Moves from Investors?
summary: Akamai Technologies recently announced an expanded partnership with Apiiro, integrating their application security and ASPM platforms to help enterprises secure applications across the entire software development lifecycle. This collaboration equips joint customers with unified visibility and actionable prioritization for application risks, evidenced by reported annual savings of over US$3 million for one Fortune 100 insurance provider. We'll examine how the enhanced application security...
